.audi-footer{background:var(--color-black);color:var(--color-white);padding:var(--space-l) var(--space-column) var(--space-m)}.audi-footer__inner-wrapper{margin:0 auto;max-width:1920px}.audi-footer__toolbar{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;justify-content:flex-end}.audi-footer__toolbar--border-top{border-top:1px solid var(--color-grey-70);justify-content:space-between;margin:var(--space-s) 0 0;padding:var(--space-m) 0 0}.audi-footer__copyright{margin:0 var(--space-xxl) var(--space-m) 0}.audi-footer__copyright,.audi-footer__disclaimer{color:var(--color-grey-50)}.audi-footer__disclaimer a{color:var(--color-white);text-decoration:none}.audi-footer__disclaimer a:hover{color:var(--color-grey-30)}@media (min-width:768px){.audi-footer{padding:var(--space-xl) var(--space-column) var(--space-m)}.audi-footer__toolbar--border-top{margin:0;padding:var(--space-l) 0 0}}
.audi-footer__categories{margin:var(--space-xxxl) 0 0}.audi-footer__categories-list{display:block;list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0}.audi-footer__categories-list-item{border-bottom:1px solid var(--color-grey-50);padding:0}.audi-footer__categories-list-item:first-of-type{margin-top:calc(var(--space-xxxl) - 2){margin-left:0}.audi-footer__categories-list-item:nth-of-type(3n){margin-right:0}.audi-footer__categories-link-wrapper{cursor:auto;margin-bottom:var(--space-xxl);padding-bottom:0}}@media (min-width:1440px){.audi-footer__categories-list{max-width:calc(1100px + 4*var(--space-xxl))}.audi-footer__categories-list--six-elements-exception{max-width:calc(660px + 2*var(--space-xxl))}.audi-footer__categories-list-item{max-width:220px}.audi-footer__categories-list--six-elements-exception .audi-footer__categories-list-item{width:220px}.audi-footer__categories-list-item:nth-of-type(3n),.audi-footer__categories-list-item:nth-of-type(3n -2){margin-left:calc(var(--space-xxl)/2);margin-right:calc(var(--space-xxl)/2)}.audi-footer__categories-list-item:nth-of-type(5n -
